explanation: Funds are required for the procurement of Air Intercept Missile-120 (AIM-120) Advanced Medium-Range Air-to Air Missile (AMRAAM) systems to increase stocks of critical munitions. This is a new start, AMRAAM production capacity for FY 2022 is being fulfilled by the Air Force and available
Funds are required for the procurement of AMRAAM systems to increase stocks of critical munitions. This is an emergency budget requirement.
